title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: **Git Credential Manager (GCM) & Enterprise Managed Users (EMU)**: Added documentation on SSO redirect settings affecting GCM behavior. EMU users must disable GCM account filtering if SSO redirect is off to avoid repeated authentication prompts.

**CodeQL Language Analysis**: Clarified language specification behavior and matrix configuration. Emphasized using the `language` matrix for parallel analysis and avoiding sequential scans. Noted that alternative identifiers (e.g., `javascript`) don't exclude related languages (e.g., TypeScript).
**Audit Log Streaming**: Enabled region selection for Amazon S3 streaming on GHES versions >3.14.
**Documentation Updates**: Renamed article from "Why is Git always asking for my password?" to "...credentials" and added GCM/EMU context.
summary:
- **Git Credential Manager (GCM) & Enterprise Managed Users (EMU)**: Added documentation on SSO redirect settings affecting GCM behavior. EMU users must disable GCM account filtering if SSO redirect is off to avoid repeated authentication prompts.
- **CodeQL Language Analysis**: Clarified language specification behavior and matrix configuration. Emphasized using the `language` matrix for parallel analysis and avoiding sequential scans. Noted that alternative identifiers (e.g., `javascript`) don't exclude related languages (e.g., TypeScript).
- **Audit Log Streaming**: Enabled region selection for Amazon S3 streaming on GHES versions >3.14.
- **Documentation Updates**: Renamed article from "Why is Git always asking for my password?" to "...credentials" and added GCM/EMU context.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- **Git Credential Manager (GCM) & Enterprise Managed Users (EMU)**: Added documentation on SSO redirect settings affecting GCM behavior. EMU users must disable GCM account filtering if SSO redirect is off to avoid repeated authentication prompts.
- **CodeQL Language Analysis**: Clarified language specification behavior and matrix configuration. Emphasized using the `language` matrix for parallel analysis and avoiding sequential scans. Noted that alternative identifiers (e.g., `javascript`) don't exclude related languages (e.g., TypeScript).
- **Audit Log Streaming**: Enabled region selection for Amazon S3 streaming on GHES versions >3.14.
- **Documentation Updates**: Renamed article from "Why is Git always asking for my password?" to "...credentials" and added GCM/EMU context.

### Title
Update docs: GCM for EMU, CodeQL language setup, GHES audit log regions
